leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-组学整合与知识图谱生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 对齐→融合→推理→检索→证据链→评测

queries: [WEB] knowledge graph completion benchmarks bioinformatics github
[WEB] drug repurposing knowledge graph datasets github

tools.name: OpenBG
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale open datasets and benchmarks for domain-specific knowledge graph evaluation
tools.detailed_description: OpenBG provides a suite of datasets designed for evaluating knowledge graph performance in domain-specific scenarios, supporting tasks like knowledge reasoning and completion.

tools.name: OpenBioLink
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for evaluating link prediction on heterogeneous biomedical graphs
tools.detailed_description: OpenBioLink is a comprehensive resource and evaluation framework designed to assess link prediction models on large-scale, heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs, ensuring high-quality benchmarks for computational biology.

tools.name: ThoughtSource
tools.one_line_profile: Central resource and toolkit for Chain-of-Thought reasoning data and evaluation in science
tools.detailed_description: ThoughtSource is a framework and data hub for Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning, specifically curating scientific and medical QA datasets (like PubMedQA) to evaluate and improve the reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models.

tools.name: BioKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning and evaluating biological knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: BioKEEN is a Python package that interfaces with PyKEEN to facilitate the training and evaluation of knowledge graph embedding models specifically on biological data, integrating with bio-ontologies.

tools.name: metapaths
tools.one_line_profile: R package for similarity search in heterogeneous knowledge graphs using meta-paths
tools.detailed_description: metapaths is an R package that performs similarity search and analysis on heterogeneous knowledge graphs by leveraging meta-path based metrics, useful for omics and network biology analysis.

tools.name: PheKnowLator
tools.one_line_profile: Ecosystem for constructing and benchmarking heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: PheKnowLator provides a pipeline and benchmarks for constructing semantically rich, heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs, supporting mechanistic evaluation and molecular characterization.

tools.name: SapBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Self-alignment pretraining model for biomedical entity linking and alignment
tools.detailed_description: SapBERT is a pre-training framework and model for self-aligning biomedical entities, widely used as a tool for entity linking and normalization in biomedical knowledge graph construction.

tools.name: BioKG
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale knowledge graph dataset for relational learning on biological data
tools.detailed_description: BioKG is a comprehensive biological knowledge graph dataset designed for benchmarking relational learning models, integrating data from multiple biomedical databases.

tools.name: DRKG
tools.one_line_profile: A comprehensive biological knowledge graph and toolkit for drug repurposing
tools.detailed_description: DRKG (Drug Repurposing Knowledge Graph) is a large-scale biological knowledge graph integrating information from six databases including DrugBank, Hetionet, and GNBR. It provides a rich dataset of entities (genes, compounds, diseases) and relations, along with a set of tools and pre-trained embeddings specifically designed to facilitate drug repurposing tasks using graph machine learning.

tools.name: PrimeKG
tools.one_line_profile: Precision Medicine Knowledge Graph for multi-omics data integration
tools.detailed_description: PrimeKG is a precision medicine knowledge graph that integrates diverse biomedical data sources to provide a holistic view of diseases. It includes a pipeline for building the graph from raw data, enabling researchers to study disease mechanisms, drug-target interactions, and phenotype associations through a unified multi-omics graph structure.

tools.name: PyKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: A Python library for learning and evaluating knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: PyKEEN (Python KnowlEdge EmbeddiNgs) is a comprehensive library for training and evaluating knowledge graph embedding models. It provides a unified pipeline for dataset loading, model training, and evaluation, supporting a wide range of KGE architectures and loss functions. It is widely used in bioinformatics for tasks like link prediction in biomedical knowledge graphs.

tools.name: OGB
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and evaluators for graph machine learning
tools.detailed_description: Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) is a collection of realistic, large-scale, and diverse benchmark datasets for machine learning on graphs. It includes specific datasets for bioinformatics and chemistry (e.g., molecular property prediction, protein-protein association), providing standard data loaders and evaluation metrics to facilitate reproducible research in AI for Science.

tools.name: BioKGBench
tools.one_line_profile: A benchmark for evaluating AI agents in biomedical science tasks
tools.detailed_description: BioKGBench is a benchmark designed to evaluate the capabilities of AI agents (specifically Large Language Models) in performing biomedical science tasks using Knowledge Graphs. It provides a set of tasks and evaluation metrics to assess how well agents can leverage KG structures for scientific reasoning and fact-checking in the biomedical domain.
